#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;
 
long long int f(long long int n)
{
	long long int r;
	
	if(n >= 0)
		r = (n+1)*(n+2)*(n+3);
	
	return (r/6) ;
}
 
int main()
{
	long long int N,A,B,C;
	scanf("%lld%lld%lld%lld",&N,&A,&B,&C);
	printf("%lld\n",f(N)-f(N-A-1)-f(N-B-1)-f(N-C-1)+f(N-A-B-2)+f(N-A-C-2)+f(N-C-B-2)-f(N-A-B-C-3));
	
	return 0;
 
}
